title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Field Trips
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Grad 2016     Field Trips                Field Trips        Student measuring wind speed.                     6th Grade Experience   10 Photos  Vital Signs: Measuring health of an ecosystem.          7th Grade Experience   10 Photos  Rock On! Landforms along Northshore Scenic Road and Valley of Fire State Park reveal many geologic processes.          8th Grade Experience   10 Photos  From River to Reservoir-Six stations included a human water cycle obstacle course, water quality testing, trash survey, fire equipment, quagga mussels, and historic perspective.            10th Grade Experience   9 Photos  Science through language arts: “The Art of Seeing”-connecting to nature and wilderness through journaling and poetry and a day on the river
